actions.message:
It's rping with posts that are under 10 words.

Since we want sentences as answers and responds, we enforced out bot to delete and warn people for Onelining

**But don't worry, Just write more then 10 words per post**

Ideas?
Well you can always: "Hello there!" *He/she says in an welcoming tone, as a smile was visible*

actions.fieldName: Please only rp in rp channels. Keep other stuff in  #out-of-character or #off-topic

actions.message:
This commands adds MONEY to the mentioned player

Example:
-addto @player 100 s
Would add 100 silver

**S** = Silver
**G** = Gold
**C** = Copper

*Do -bal / -bal @user to check balance*
actions.name: Add Embed Field

actions.message:
This command adds an DORM channel to the DORMS category

Example:
-Dorm Dario
This would add a channel to the dorms category called:
Darios-room
actions.name: Add Embed Field

actions.message:
This commands creates an event where players react an emoji to join

Example:
-travel america
This would show an embed msg with text about we going to america with an reaction
And after 5 mins it would show all players joining
actions.name: Add Embed Field

actions.message:
this commands set's the channel the cmd is used it as their room
**Mind slots, Don't overwrite slots**

Example:
-setroom @user 1
This makes his -myroom to the channel the cmd was run in
-setroom @user 2
This makes his -myroom2 to the channel the cmd was run in
-setroom @user 3
This makes his -myroom3 to the channel the cmd was run in
actions.name: Add Embed Field

actions.message:
this commands set's slot to the name of the mentioned user
**Mind slots, Don't overwrite slots**

Example:
-setc @user 1 (name)
This makes his -c1 to (name)
-setc @user 2 (name)
This makes his -c2 to (name)
-setc @user 3 (name)
This makes his -c3 to (name)

*Checking someone elses char?*

**-Char2 (slot) @user**
This will show their character, only USABLE by admins
**-chars2 @user**
This shows all their characters, only USABLE by admins
actions.name: Add Embed Field

actions.message: This command shows the TIME and DATE of the mentioned players last msg
actions.name: Add Embed Field

actions.message:
**HARD CMD**

Only people TEACHED by MIRAI can use this correct

**Plus Rep**
-reputation @user 1-99

**Min Rep**
-reputation @user -1 - (-99)

(But)

Going below 0 will make their hero lvl lower by 1
While going higher then 99 will make them lvl up

Amounts actions:

*Hero Course*|      *Steal Money*
1 - 5 +rep                   |       5 - 10 -REP

*Help civilians*      |      *Kidnap or hostage*
2 - 4 +rep                   |       7 - 11 -REP

*Save Civilian*              |     *Murder Civilian/Hero*
4 - 8 +rep                   |      15 - 20 - REP

(Other actions take Mirai or Namine/Kellie/Jack or Alex to decide amount)
actions.name: Add Embed Field

actions.message:
This command shows you your current money state.

Example:
If i do, -bal
it would show my **Gold & Silver & Copper**
actions.name: Add Embed Field

actions.message:
This cmd requests a dorm room by sending a msg in an admin chat

**They respond, spam will conclude in having an TIME RESTRICTION of days**
actions.name: Add Embed Field

actions.message:
These commands will earn you silver or copper.

Work = 2 mins between each cmd

earn = 30 mins between each cmd

(Can be changed by admins)
actions.name: Add Embed Field

actions.message:
this will give money over to an other player from your balance

Example:
-give @user 100 s
this would give @user 100 silver and you lose 100 silver

**G** = Gold
**S** = Silver
**C** = Copper

*Do -bal to check your balance, as you cannot give more then you have*
actions.name: Add Embed Field

actions.message:
Depending on what of the three this will show your room of that slot

**Myroom** = slot 1

**Myroom2** = Slot 2

**Myroom3** = Slot 3

*To see all of them at once, do* **Myrooms**
actions.name: Add Embed Field

actions.message:
Depending on what of the three this will show your Character of that slot

**C1** = slot 1

**C2** = Slot 2

**C3** = Slot 3

Or **-Char** *Number of slot*

*To see all of them at once, do* **-Chars**
actions.name: Add Embed Field

actions.message:
Explaination:

**Seconds** = -seconds (amount secs) reason
This will remind you in (amount secs) in your dm for *reason*

**Minutes** = -minutes (amount mins) reason
This will remind you in (amount mins) in your dm for *reason*

**Hours** = -hours (amount hours) reason
This will remind you in (amount hours) in your dm for *reason*

*Making it into 1 cmd soon, but my bot is denying me*
actions.name: Add Embed Field
